name: A Bard's Journey
description:
A Bard's Journey mixes Rythm Game with RPG elements.
Play as a Bard during his initiatory trip to become a professional.

Follow the rythm and convince people to be fan of your music !

You'll find music sheets on your way. Collect them to master your music and make it even more convincing !

This game was done in less than 48h for the Ludum Dare 45.

Additional Informations : 
- This game is an APK file, so it's for ANDROID only.
- Some features that I really wanted to add are missing because of the time, but the main mechanics are here.

I hope you'll enjoy playing the game as much as I enjoyed making it !

-HAVING TROUBLES WITH DOWNLOADING FILE ON ANDROID ?-

If you encounter troubles with download (internet page closing without downloading), just close all tabs from your phone's internet browser, then try again.
